title: Bloomberg Markets: Grossman on Cyber Security for Banking
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Grossman on Cyber Security for Banking
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Steven Grossman Vice President of Strategy Bay Dynamics Discussing cyber security for the banking industry and why compliance does not always mean a firm is secure.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
